meanings.definition: Psocids: small, wingless insects commonly found in damp environments
meanings.sent1: In the garden, I spotted psocids crawling on the wet leaves.
meanings.sent2: Exterminators were called to get rid of the psocids infesting the basement.
meanings.sent3: The psocids threw a party in the puddle, inviting all their insect friends.
meanings.sent4: The psocids multiplied rapidly, spreading like wildfire in the moist soil.
meanings.sent5: The children were fascinated by the psocids, observing their movements under a magnifying glass.

meanings.definition: Psocids: a type of pest that feeds on mold and fungi
meanings.sent1: The homeowner had to deal with a pesky infestation of psocids in the attic.
meanings.sent2: Psocids can cause damage to buildings by consuming mold and fungi.
meanings.sent3: The psocids threw a feast on the moldy bread left out on the kitchen counter.
meanings.sent4: The psocids devoured the mold like hungry beasts in the dark corners of the house.
meanings.sent5: The musty smell in the room indicated the presence of psocids feasting on damp walls.

meanings.definition: Psocids: tiny creatures that resemble lice or mites
meanings.sent1: Under the microscope, the psocids looked like miniature versions of lice.
meanings.sent2: Psocids are often mistaken for mites due to their similar appearance.
meanings.sent3: The psocids tried to sneak into the ant colony, pretending to be lost lice.
meanings.sent4: The psocids scurried around the room, resembling tiny ghosts haunting the furniture.
meanings.sent5: The children giggled at the psocids, thinking they were playing hide-and-seek with invisible friends.
